hero.title: Mert Batut | Frontend Developer
hero.description: I am a Frontend Developer passionate about creating modern and scalable frontend solutions. Combining user-centric designs with functionality to deliver superior user experiences.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: Technologies I use in my projects and skills I continuously develop.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Projects showcasing my experience and skills
projects.notFoundDesc: There are no projects in this category yet. Please choose another category or check back later.
projects.sampleProject1Desc: A fully interactive 3D portfolio web application created using ThreeJS and React. Users can navigate between projects in 3D.
projects.sampleProject2Desc: A mobile application where you can view furniture in your home using augmented reality technology. View with real dimensions and materials.
projects.sampleProject3Desc: A dashboard application that visualizes large data sets with interactive charts, maps, and animated indicators.

profile.description: Get to know me and my professional journey.
profile.aboutDesc: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer with strong expertise in React, JavaScript, and modern frontend frameworks. With a solid foundation in responsive UI development, I create intuitive interfaces that enhance user experiences while maintaining performance. I've also expanded my capabilities into backend technologies including Node.js and RESTful API development, making me versatile across the full development stack. I thrive in collaborative environments and continuously pursue new technologies to stay at the cutting edge of web development.
profile.recentWork: At Alesta Software, I develop custom software solutions for construction companies. I create modern and interactive interfaces using Angular, React, React Native, and Redux technologies. I implement responsive designs with Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap, and handle API integrations with Axios. I focus on improving user experience and optimizing application performance.
profile.prevWork: Developed user-friendly interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented design concepts and worked on website responsiveness.
profile.recentWork2: Developed modern and interactive interfaces for the Just Markt virtual grocery application using React, Tailwind CSS, and Axios. Implemented API connections for product listing, cart, and order functionalities. Enhanced user experience through performance optimizations and managed application state efficiently with Redux.
profile.realEstateDesc: Worked as a real estate consultant at Batut Real Estate, managing client relationships and property listings. Developed skills in client communication, negotiation, and problem-solving.
profile.resumeIntro: As a Front-End Developer with 2 years of professional experience focusing on React and Angular, I specialize in developing modern web applications. I create performance-oriented solutions that prioritize user experience, built on strong foundations in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3. Beyond my front-end skills, I've expanded my capabilities in the back-end domain, developing entry-level projects using C#, ASP.NET, SQL Server, and Docker. This has given me the ability to understand and implement full-stack architecture. I approach each project with a detail-oriented mindset, prioritizing clean code and user experience, while continuously developing my technical skills to keep pace with evolving industry demands.
profile.bootcampDesc: Completed an intensive frontend development bootcamp focused on modern web technologies. I learned to use frontend tools including React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind, Axios, and Figma. I had the opportunity to work full-time on a real project for 6 months. During this period, my team and I developed an online pizza ordering system. I gained valuable experience in applying theoretical knowledge practically and working as part of a development team.
profile.continuedLearningDesc: After completing my formal training, I've continued to expand my knowledge in both frontend and backend technologies. I regularly work on personal projects to apply new technologies and methodologies, enhancing my skills in React, Node.js, and other web development frameworks.

footer.title: Send me a message!
footer.description: Do you have a question or suggestion, or do you just want to say hello?
